title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom, 2.25 Bathroom Home off Peacock Hill
posting_body: Beautiful 3 Bedroom, 2.25 Bathroom Home off Peacock Hill
*Short term lease Available September 1st, 2022- May 31st, 2023 only*
This beautiful two-story home is approximately 1,964 sq.
ft. and is conveniently located near Costco & other shopping amenities.
The home features a spacious living room with a fireplace, which leads to the cozy dining room that offers lots of natural light and has easy access to the kitchen.
The kitchen includes a double sink, stainless appliances and offers plenty of cabinet space.
There is a large great room with a wood burning stove, a powder room close by and French doors that lead to the partially fenced backyard.
On the second level of the home are 2 bedrooms and the primary bedroom.
The primary bedroom has its own bathroom, a large walk in closet and balcony access, which is the perfect place to enjoy a cup of coffee!
This home offers a 2-car garage and has washer & dryer hookups only.
Pets Negotiable and No Smoking property.
Applications accepted only through McNally Management.
Apply at: <URL>
